content: **level 2-advanced** angle stitches my 2022 fall collection is built around a maple leaf motif since it is an advanced design that used angles i put together a free pattern and tutorial in potholder size to get your feet wet if angles are new to you bonus this is a double-sided potholder worked in the round i cover how to do this in the tutorial as well enjoy ☺ written for **mosaic overlay crochet** this pattern includes instruction packet and stitch key detailed charts written pattern photo tutorials video tutorials for each type of stitch used in the patterns **size 9 x 9 ** size will vary depending on yarn weight and hook used this calculation is based on dk cotton yarn with a 4mm hook yarn cotton yarn is recommended as it holds up well to heat **color a design color 76 yds color b background 99 yds** check out my entire fall collection https //www ravelry com/bundles/fall-collection-2022-maple-leaves the instructions packet and video tutorials should answer any questions you may have i also have a facebook group dedicated to answering questions and building community around my patterns please join us https //linktr ee/heathernobledesigns
